issue.title: Topic name mismatch on heavy worlds with custom names

content.raw: Also worth pointing out that I used the word "heavy" because I think this is more related to the time it takes to load a world than to the number of models. I can imagine the same issue can happen with a world containing a single model which is really large.
content.html: Also worth pointing out that I used the word "heavy" because I think this is more related to the time it takes to load a world than to the number of models. I can imagine the same issue can happen with a world containing a single model which is really large.
